QuoteLineItemAttribute.name: QuoteLineItemAttribute
QuoteLineItemAttribute.description: Represents a virtual object that stores an attribute specified for a quote line item.

AttributeDefinitionId.description: The ID of the attribute definition for this quote line item attribute.

AttributeName.description: The name of the quote line item attribute.

AttributePicklistValueId.description: The ID of the attribute picklist value if the attribute is a picklist type.

AttributeValue.description: The value of the quote line item attribute. For example 5-TB storage.

ExternalId.description: An auto-generated ID of the attribute record saved in an external system, such as an HBase database.

QuoteLineItemId.description: The associated parent quote line item.
